mean_cn: n. （演讲、音乐会等的）听众，观众，正式会见，拥护者
mean_en: a group of people who gather together to listen to something (such as a concert) or watch something (such as a movie or play); the people who attend a performance
sentence: We invite students from drama schools to be our audiences.
sentence_trans: 我们请了戏剧学校的学生来我们节目当观众。
